Text: its asking for the serial before installing...where is it?please..

Step 1 Use the 1.st serial (Nero v9) serial in Nero 9 document

Step 2 Delete Toolbar.exe: C:\Documents and Settings\user\Local Settings\Temp\NERO1002859\unit_app_75\Toolbar.exe

Step 3 Activation the Nero :Go Nero ControlCenter 4 Licensz and use activation code
the 2.serial.

install the program and enter the serial code and then press start and search for %temp% a folder called "Temp" will appear, open the folder and find the path - NERO1002859\unit_app_75, once you are in this directory, delete the file and search for nero, open Nero Control Centre 4 and add the activation code.
How do I do when I have deleted the Toolbar.exe file? IÂ´ve entered the activation code in Nero controll center 4...what do I do next?
